name: The Last Defence
description:
You are the last defence. Defend the castle from the waves of crystal monsters.

Controls
                 KeyboardMouse   : Controller
Move             - WASD             : left analog stick
Dash            - Space                : B button
aim                - mouse         : right analog stick
attack           - Left Mouse    : right bumper
circle  attack  - E              : Y button
spiral  attack - Q             : X button

You are the last defence. Defend the castle from the waves of crystal monsters.

This is our submission to the Ludum Dare 46. 

My friend Shadow Neko did the art and I the code.

This is game 4 of my create 12 game/prototypes in 1 year learning journey. Follow me on Youtube, instagram and discord to see the video about this jam.
